thread.title_full: Seasonal Scouting Assistant - Spring - Pro Sports

title: Seasonal Scouting Assistant - Spring - Pro Sports
text: Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: Creates video cut-ups of our current players and Draft-eligible players, as directed by our player personnel staff....   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
